item.title: Biden faces scrutiny over clemency granted to individuals convicted in major corruption cases
item.description: President Joe Biden is facing backlash over granting clemency to individuals convicted in major public corruption cases.

item.title: Trump could resurrect his old D.C. hotel
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is reportedly looking into a deal to bring his former District of Columbia hotel back to life.
